alert.note: Alert for Arches, Grand Flat; La Sal and Abajo Mountains (Utah) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS GrandJunction (Western Colorado and Eastern Utah)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued May 14 at 4:57PM MDT by NWS GrandJunction
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of west central Mesa County through 530 PM MDT... At 457 PM MDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm 19 miles east of Castle Valley, moving northeast at 15 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 50 mph and pea to half inch hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. This storm will remain over mainly rural areas of west central Mesa County, including the following locations... Gateway. This includes Colorado 141 between mile markers 110 and 124. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.50 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.

area.areaDesc: Arches, Grand Flat; La Sal and Abajo Mountains
